targets.query:
from(bucket: "homeassistant")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_generated_solar_energy_total")
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: 2023-01-30T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_generated_solar_energy_total")
  |> window(every: 1d)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> difference()
  |> sort()
  |> last()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: 2023-01-30T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_generated_solar_energy_total")
  |> window(every: 1w)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> difference()
  |> sort()
  |> last()

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, SUM(total_energy_used) AS "Matt's Tesla"
FROM (
	SELECT 
		$__timeGroup(date, ${aggregation}) AS time,
		charging_process_id,
		SUM(energy_used) AS total_energy_used 
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			charging_process_id,
			CASE
				WHEN charger_phases IS NULL THEN charger_power
				ELSE charger_actual_current * charger_voltage * CAST(1 AS float) / 1000.0
			END *
			EXTRACT(epoch FROM (date - LAG(date) OVER (PARTITION BY charging_process_id ORDER BY date))) / 3600 AS energy_used,
			date
		FROM 
			charges
		WHERE 
			$__timeFilter(date)
	) t
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date)
	GROUP BY time, charging_process_id
	ORDER BY time, charging_process_id
) t2
INNER JOIN charging_processes cp ON t2.charging_process_id = cp.id
WHERE cp.geofence_id = 1
GROUP BY time

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "matt_s_laptop_today_energy")
  |> window(every: ${aggregation})
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> increase()
  |> difference()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_battery_state_of_charge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> mean()
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_generated_solar_energy_total")
  |> window(every: ${aggregation})
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> difference()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kW")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_import_from_grid_actual")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kW")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_export_to_grid_actual")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

panels.description: Includes both solar and battery output

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kW")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "growatt_output_kilowatt_actual")
  |> window(every: v.windowPeriod)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
